body: At 6th level, a beastmorph's mutagen grants him additional abilities and options. The alchemist gains his choice of two of the abilities listed in the beast shape I spell, which persist as long as the mutagen. He may select two different abilities each time he creates a mutagen. This ability replaces swift poisoning.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Alchemist/Alchemist Archetypes/Beastmorph/Improved Beastform Mutagen
name: Improved Beastform Mutagen
